name: Blogs
tagline: This is a blog system, just wanna write something
body:
#Welcome to the Steve Li's Blog!


This is my personal blog!!

I try to write something at here, most of them are notes I guess. Now I am working for a small staffing services company. I hope I can work for google in the future!!

I am from China, so the grammar of these blogs is not perfect, but acceptable. I try to improve my English writing skills.

I wish github is suppose to add the tag or category feature in the future, so I am able to group my blogs.\

Thank you so much. Everyone have a great day!!!

[sorting](https://github.com/SteveLi90/blogs/sorting_algo.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
